name: Destroy All Humans! Big Willy Unleashed
name_original: Destroy All Humans! Big Willy Unleashed
description:
Crypto is back in the franchise that turns the tables on sci-fi action
games. Destroy All Humans! Big Willy Unleashed allows you to play as the
alien and take on the most feared enemy in the galaxy – mankind!

This time around, it’s the funky `70s and fast food restaurants are
proliferating like a disco inferno. In fact, the biggest fast-food chain
of them all – Big Willy’s – is really a front for Crypto and Pox. After
all, what better way to dispose of all those left-over bodies from
decades of cranial DNA harvesting than to use them in a lip-smacking
fast food menu!

But someone is threatening to expose Big Willy’s – none other than their
biggest competitor, Kolonel Klucken. Crypto must stop Klucken before he
exposes their operations on Earth, culminating in a supreme battle of
corporate giants.

Take on the Kolonel and his minions with a devastating arsenal of
weapons and mental abilities. When guns aren’t enough, take to the sky
in your UFO to unleash massive destruction from above, or step behind
the controls of newest addition to Crypto’s arsenal, the gigantic
lumbering Big Willy mech.

With the saucer’s devastating arsenal, Crypto’s mysteriously sadistic
powers, and the rampaging Big Willy mech, there are now THREE ways to
Destroy All Humans!
